components.name: Screengrab
components.description: A component responsible for capturing screenshots of mobile applications using different strategies.

components.name: ScreenshotStrategy
components.description: An interface that defines various strategies for taking screenshots, allowing for flexibility in implementation.

components.name: FileWritingScreenshotCallback
components.description: Handles the saving of captured screenshots to the file system, managing file paths and directories.

data_flows.description: Screengrab invokes a screenshot strategy to capture the current view of the application.
The screenshot captured by the strategy is passed to the callback for saving to the file system.

trust_boundaries.name: Application Environment
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the application code and the external environment where screenshots are saved.
